text:
Silver Mount Cemetery (Staten Island): A graveyard belfry on one of the island's cemeteries. The cemetery is located on the east side of Victory Boulevard, across from Silver Lake Park.

1924

P. L. Sperr
title: Cemeteries - Silver Mount Cemetery - Staten Island

text:
Marine Cemetery (Staten Island), on Victory Boulevard, in Silver Lake Park. The gravestones are of those who died in the Quarantine hospital of yellow fever. The victims were not Staten Islanders. See "Staten Island and its People" by Leng and Davis, p. 982.

February 28, 1928
Views 1,2,3

P. L. Sperr
title: Cemeteries - Marine Cemetery - Staten Island.
